docs.summary: The wix-application module contains functionality for...
description: > **This module is available only in Wix Blocks**
> [Wix Blocks](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-blocks-check-out-our-articles) is a workspace for building Wix apps. It is currently a Beta version, open to a limited number of users.
This module is useful when [managing your application's pricing](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-blocks-setting-up-and-managing-your-apps-pricing).
To use the wixApplication API, import `wixApplication` from the `wix-application` module:

ret.doc: Fulfilled - A string with data about the installation of your app on a specific site

docs.summary: Gets the Wix Blocks App data as an encoded Jason Web Token (JWT) string.
description: The `getAppInstance()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a string with data about the installation of your app on a specific site.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - An object with data about the installation of your app on a specific site

docs.summary: Gets the Wix Blocks App data as a decoded Jason Web Token (JWT) object.
description: The `getDecodedAppInstance()` function returns a Promise that resolves to an object with data about the installation of your app on a specific site.

docs.summary: An object with data about the installation of your app on a specific site.

members.name: appDefId
members.doc: The unique idenfitier of your app.

members.name: instanceId
members.doc: The ID of your app on this specific site.

members.name: vendorProductId
members.doc: The Plan ID of the app purchased by the site.
